price: Nag-aakala ba siya na walang nakakakaya sa kanya na isa man?
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabu an lan yaqdira ʿalayhi aḥadun
